Sentencas: Nickel-SDC anode was experimentally demonstrated for the direct utilization of bio-methanol in solid oxide fuel cells at intermediate temperature (IT) range.
Titulo: Bio-methanol fueled intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell: A future solution as component in auxiliary power unit for eco-transportation

Sentencas: Cell performance was determined (350mW.cm(-2) at 750 degrees C) in operating conditions propitious to carbon deposition.
Titulo: Bio-methanol fueled intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell: A future solution as component in auxiliary power unit for eco-transportation

Sentencas: Cell performance with methanol was slightly higher than with hydrogen.
Titulo: Bio-methanol fueled intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell: A future solution as component in auxiliary power unit for eco-transportation

Sentencas: Different reactants distribution adjacent to the double conducting electrolyte may explain the improved cell output.
Titulo: Bio-methanol fueled intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell: A future solution as component in auxiliary power unit for eco-transportation

Sentencas: Better performance with methanol could be also consequence of the improved electronic conductivity in the presence of carbon deposits.
Titulo: Bio-methanol fueled intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell: A future solution as component in auxiliary power unit for eco-transportation

Sentencas: Results indicated that catalytic decomposition of methanol in the anodic three phase boundaries is dependent of temperature and governed by a complex anodic electrochemical dynamics.
Titulo: Bio-methanol fueled intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell: A future solution as component in auxiliary power unit for eco-transportation

Sentencas: Anode gases were analyzed and a process scheme including H-2/CO/CH3OH has been proposed.
Titulo: Bio-methanol fueled intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell: A future solution as component in auxiliary power unit for eco-transportation

Sentencas: An experimental protocol using a switch between hydrogen and methanol feed was elucidated and a series of chemical reactions was proposed inducing the coking removing from anode.
Titulo: Bio-methanol fueled intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell: A future solution as component in auxiliary power unit for eco-transportation

Sentencas: For a pre-feasibility assessment of the experimental cell, performance comparison with Delphi Gen 3 cell fed by diesel used as element in an auxiliary power unit was proposed.
Titulo: Bio-methanol fueled intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell: A future solution as component in auxiliary power unit for eco-transportation

Sentencas: Obtained results are encouraging to go down the thorny and long-pathway to make the APU-SOFC technology viable for the eco-transportation sector.
Titulo: Bio-methanol fueled intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell: A future solution as component in auxiliary power unit for eco-transportation
